api/BooseApp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | booseAppDocs
api/BooseApp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BooseApp Assembly BooseApp.dll Canvas for drawing shapes and lines on a Panel. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(Panel) Creates a new AppCanvas using the given Panel. public AppCanvas(Panel p) Parameters p Panel Panel to draw on. Properties PenColour Gets or sets the pen color for drawing. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Gets or sets the X position of the cursor. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the Y position of the cursor. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle at the cursor position. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int Radius of the circle. filled bool True to fill, false for outline. Clear() Clears the cursor position. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the cursor to the given position. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int X position. y int Y position. ExportBase64() Exports the canvas image as a Base64 string. public string ExportBase64() Returns string Base64 string of the image. ImportBase64(string) Imports a Base64 image string to the canvas. public void ImportBase64(string base64) Parameters base64 string Base64 string. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the cursor to a new position. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int X position. y int Y position. RealClear() Clears the whole canvas. public void RealClear() Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle at the cursor position. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Width of the rectangle. height int Height of the rectangle. filled bool True to fill, false for outline. Rectangle(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle (alias for Rect). public void Rectangle(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Width. height int Height. filled bool True to fill. Reset() Resets the cursor before running code. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Sets the cursor position. public void Set(int x, int y) Parameters x int X position. y int Y position. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen color using RGB values. public void SetColour(int r, int gVal, int b) Parameters r int Red value. gVal int Green value. b int Blue value. Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle at the cursor position. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int Width of the triangle. height int Height of the triangle. WriteText(string) Writes text at the cursor position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string Text to write. getBitmap() Gets the bitmap used for drawing. public object getBitmap() Returns object The bitmap object.

api/BooseApp.html.title: Namespace BooseApp | booseAppDocs
api/BooseApp.html.summary: Namespace BooseApp Classes AppArray Represents an internal array utility or data structure. AppBoolean Represents a boolean variable command with evaluation support. AppCall Wraps BOOSE Call command to inject runtime parameter scopes for method calls. AppCanvas Canvas for drawing shapes and lines on a Panel. AppCircle Command to draw a circle outline using the application canvas. AppCommandFactory Factory for BOOSE commands, mapped to our custom implementations (MyIf, MyWhile, etc). Also cleans input command names to avoid invisible BOM issues (e.g. "﻿if"). AppDrawTo Command to draw a line from the current position to a new position. AppElse Represents an internal class used within the assembly.{ AppEnd Represents an end command that closes conditional or loop blocks. AppFor Implements a for-loop command for the BOOSE stored program. AppIf Implements the IF conditional command for the BOOSE program. AppInt AppMethod Wraps BOOSE Method so we can: Register parameter names for calls Ensure the method return variable (method name) exists with the correct type AppMoveTo AppPeek Implements the Peek command to read a value from an array into a target variable. AppPenColour AppPoke Implements the Poke command to write a value into an array cell. AppReal Represents an internal implementation detail and is not intended for direct use in application code. AppRect AppWhile Implements the WHILE conditional command for the BOOSE program. AppWrite Application-specific implementation of the BOOSE.Write command. When executed, this command writes the evaluated expression text to the provided canvas. Form1 Main form for my BOOSE interpreter. Handles running BOOSE code, validation, saving/loading, and updating the canvas and debug window. IEvaluation Program The main entry point for the BOOSE application.

index.html.summary: This is the HOMEPAGE. Refer to Markdown for how to write markdown files. Quick Start Notes: Add images to the images folder if the file is referencing an image.
